  • Help

All Classes

Class Description
CourtTrade
This class represents the Court Trade, where the farmer can sell his grain to earn money.
Cultivator
this class represents the device Cultivator, which is supposed to wrap a field when it's ready to do so
DifficultyScene
This class implements the scene to choose the level of difficulty when starting a new game.
DumpTruck
This class implements the properties and functionalities of a DumpTruck.
Farmer
this class represents the farmer (= player) of our game
FieldTile
This class represents the three fields, with its several properties and functionalities (i.e. to grow).
Game
This class offers methods to start a new game and reloading an old game status.
GameController
This class implements a timer that enables the player to move around, counts the days and makes the fields grow with timer.
GameInformation
This class adds listeners to all the Properties that are shown in the gameScene.
GameScene
This class implements the game scene.
GameValue
This class implements some basic values like the time (as day) and the money.
Harvester
This class represents the harvester with its properties to harvest a field.
HelpScene
This class implements the helpScene which shows an image with text on it to help the player understand the game.
ImageManager
This class helps to load images.
InformationBox
This class implements a VBOX, that contains text fields for all the necessary information that the player needs while playing such as amount of money, time, ... and a button to get back to the menu.
Launcher
This class contains the main method to start the game.
LevelOfDifficulty
This class represents the level of difficulty, in which the player plays the game.
LSButton
This class provides buttons with a special design matching the theme of the game.
LSTextField
This class provides text fields with a special design matching the theme of the game.
Machine
This class implements the methods, that are basic functions for every Machine.
Matchfield
This class implements the grid pane with the matchfield and offers methods to fill the pane with image views of the ground, the buildings and the moving objects.
MenuScene
This class implements the menuScene.
MovingException
Exception class that is responsible for the exceptions that are thrown when the player tries to move the moving object off the matchfield.
MovingObject
This class represents any object on the gameboard, that is able to move.
MovingObjectController
This class implements some methods to move around and to process the fields.
MovingObjectFunctionalityController
This class implements all the actions that are possible when moving around e. g. selecting a vehicle, exiting and entering or unload grain to the silo or sell it at the court trade.
ObjectToJsonb
This class represents the serializing process, where all the game information that need to be saved are converted into a JSON-B.
ObjectToPojo
This class represents a part of the deserializing process, where all the game information that are needed for the reloading process are put into a String Array.
SavingController
This class implements the functionality of the save and end button of the informationBox of the gameScene.
SceneController
This class implements the methods, that are responsible for the change of the scene.
SeedDrill
This class represents the device SeedDrill.
SideControlPane
This class implements the side pane with the buttons to move around the matchfield and to choose the machine / farmer.
Silo
This class represents the Silo for the grain storage
Tractor
This class represents one of the two main machines in our game, the tractor.
ViewManager
This class initializes the stage and the menuScene as this scene is the first one shown, when the game starts.
WorkingDevice
This class represents the basic structure of all the working devices, which aren't able to move on their own.
